title: In ‘Pan,’ Peter Pan’s Origin Story Looks A Lot Like ‘Avatar’
text:
In ‘Pan,’ Peter Pan’s Origin Story Looks A Lot Like ‘Avatar’ 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Pan is a film that purports to tell the story of Peter Pan before he became Peter Pan. Why would a film want to do that, exactly? Well, othe...
